snippet.title: [ENG] - The girl came from the sky. -  Abyss Memory  [Official Trailer]
snippet.description:
#Game #IndieGames #UnrealEngine

Abyss Memory Fallen Angel and the Path of Magic

2022 April 28

Genre
New sense drawing action

Supported Platforms
Steam (PC)
Nintendo Switch

Supported Languages
Japanese, English (English)

Price Information
Steam version: $19.99 
Switch version: $19.99

SNS
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Shinichiro Obata
https://twitter.com/obata_416
Byking Official 
https://twitter.com/byking_official
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

About Us
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
(After more than 15 years of experience in development at Capcom Co.
Ltd. for over 15 years, established BYKING with dreams and aspirations.

This year, BYKING is entering its 15th year.

What we have stood for since the beginning of the company...

To make the games we make as interesting as possible.
To create great games that people can enjoy with enthusiasm.

That's all.
We believe that if we can achieve these goals, the results will come naturally.
In other words, all we have to do is to create games that our customers really enjoy.


The name of our company, "BYKING," expresses the following thoughts.

We will have courage and pioneering spirit like the pirates (Vikings).
We should be as greedy as a Viking and eat as much as we want!
Let us be as greedy as a Viking!
Let us do our work with pride and responsibility like a king.

We will do what is natural for those who make and sell games.
We think like this.
We believe that the industry will not weaken if we think and create what sells, what is interesting, and what makes people happy.

We have many veteran creators from major Japanese manufacturers.
We are particularly strong in the development of competitive action games.
BYKING will continue to exist as a group of game development professionals!
We want to contribute to users and the game industry as a group that is able to follow its true mission as creators!

We are still a small company, but we are determined to move forward step by step with great ambition.

Business Description
Contract development
Planning, development and sales of game software

Head office
 8 Nishi-Gotanda, Shinagawa-ku, Tokyo 141-0031, Japan　
8-9-5 Nishi-Gotanda, Shinagawa-ku, Tokyo　
9-5, Nishi-Gotanda 8-chome, Shinagawa-ku, Tokyo 141-0031, Japan

Head office phone number: 03-6302-1470
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Translated with www.DeepL.com/Translator (free version)
